RT @LaurenUnderwood I just wrapped up the House Homeland Security hearing where I questioned Sec. Nielsen about the policies her Department implemented. When I joined Congress I swore to protect #IL14 and our country. How does detaining children and separating families make us safer? It doesn't. /1

The entire PREMISE of a wall is not based in fact.

It’s based in a racist + non-evidence based trope that immigrants are dangerous.

Yet some Dems are willing to “compromise” & spend BILLIONS on a trope because we’ve accepted some kinds of racism as realpolitik in America.

.@SecNielsen is wrong. I saw children who had been locked up in cages in a processing center in McAllen, TX—separated from their parents and scared of what would happen next. https://www.thedailybeast.com/kirstjen-nielsen-says-we-dont-use-cages-for-childrenafter-us-put-migrant-kids-in-cages

Let's keep speaking out until every single infant is out of detention in Texas and elsewhere. This cannot be who we are as a country.
https://www.cbsnews.com/news/immigrant-children-detained-one-detained-baby-remains-ice-custody-detention-center-dilley-texas-2019-03-06/

Congratulations to @BobbyScott and every Democrat on the @EdLaborCmte for passing legislation to raise the federal minimum wage from a starvation wage of $7.25 an hour to a living wage of $15 an hour.

A job should lift Americans out of poverty, not keep them in it. https://twitter.com/EdLaborCmte/status/1103359613511045120 QT @EdLaborCmte The Committee has APPROVED the #RaisetheWage Act (28Y -20N)!
✅Gradually increases the minimum wage to $15 by 2024
✅Ties future increases to median wages, so the minimum wage is based on economics, not politics.
✅ Ensures all workers make at least the full federal minimum wage http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D0_rr7iX4AACxdV.jpg

If we put workers in corporate boardrooms where the real decisions are made, we can hold giant companies accountable for their actions, raise wages, and improve working conditions. https://slate.com/news-and-politics/2019/02/elizabeth-warren-corporate-board-plan-2020.html
